experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Beanbag AI
workDescription: Developed interactive analytics dashboards using React.js with TypeScript and Python backend, enhancing data visualization; integrated automated reporting to boost efficiency by 50% and reduce manual tasks by 60%
Streamlined CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 25%; enforced quality with PyTest and SonarQube, boosting code coverage to 85% and cutting vulnerabilities by 60%.

Enhanced backend performance by refactoring RESTful APIs and optimizing database queries, cutting latency by 45%; leveraged AWS CloudWatch for real-time monitoring, reducing critical incidents by 35%.
Improved system scalability by implementing caching with Redis and load balancing, increasing throughput by 40%; conducted stress testing to ensure 99.8% uptime under peak traffic.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Crewscale
workDescription: Built responsive full-stack applications using React with Redux state management and Python Flask backend, improving frontend performance by 35%; deployed on AWS EC2 with S3 storage for 99.5% uptime.
Enhanced error tracking by integrating Sentry for real-time debugging, reducing unresolved bugs by 60%; optimized PostgreSQL indexing and query execution, boosting data retrieval speed by 40%.
Boosted team velocity by 30% and cut sprint spillover by 25% through leading Agile cycles in Jira; applied effective communication and leadership to drive alignment and delivery.
